attributes.action: To Create a Green Enforcement agency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure Business are meeting their green requirments and to confer certificates upon those businesses who are working toward green and eco friendly ways of reducing ther impact upon the environment, also as a advisory service which helps businesses work towards reducing carbon emissions. The Agency will be also specific in this area and has the power to fine companies who do not comply with carbon reduction measures.
